nodes.title: If you're doing this for the Rhapsodies of Vana'diel prerequisite, you do not need to do the following and can now continue past The Cursed Temple
nodes.description: If you're doing this for the Rhapsodies of Vana'diel prerequisite, you do not need to do the following and can now continue past The Cursed Temple.

location.zone: do the following and can now continue past The Cursed Temple

nodes.title: After completing The Temple of Uggalepih, Grav'iton tells you that you need to collect eight different fragments from across Vana'diel.
nodes.description: After completing The Temple of Uggalepih, Grav'iton tells you that you need to collect eight different fragments from across Vana'diel..

location.zone: collect eight different fragments from across Vana'diel

nodes.title: To obtain one, examine a headstone and choose to remove the fragment.
nodes.description: To obtain one, examine a headstone and choose to remove the fragment..

nodes.title: Upon obtaining your final fragment, the mission is complete and you receive the message, "You now have all 8 fragments of light!"
nodes.description: Upon obtaining your final fragment, the mission is complete and you receive the message, "You now have all 8 fragments of light!".

nodes.title: See the Discussion page for Testimonials and Strategies.
nodes.description: See the Discussion page for Testimonials and Strategies..

nodes.title: Talk to Jakoh Wahcondalo at (J-9) in Kazham (Home Point #1) to obtain the Sacrificial Chamber Key, which is required to enter the deeper areas of the...
nodes.description: Talk to Jakoh Wahcondalo at (J-9) in Kazham (Home Point #1) to obtain the Sacrificial Chamber Key, which is required to enter the deeper areas of the Temple of Uggalepih..

nodes.title: Complete mission
nodes.description: Complete the mission: Return to Delkfutt's Tower

nodes.title: Optional: Talk to Aldo in the Tenshodo Headquarters inside the Neptune's Spire in Lower Jeuno (Home Point #2) to find out the fate of Verena in a...
nodes.description: Optional: Talk to Aldo in the Tenshodo Headquarters inside the Neptune's Spire in Lower Jeuno (Home Point #2) to find out the fate of Verena in a short cutscene..

location.zone: Aldo in the Tenshodo Headquarters inside the Neptune's Spire in Lower Jeuno

nodes.title: GOAL: Find your way to H-9 in The Shrine of Ru'Avitau Map #2 (Marked "q"), descend downstairs, and enter The Celestial Nexus.
nodes.description: GOAL: Find your way to H-9 in The Shrine of Ru'Avitau Map #2 (Marked "q"), descend downstairs, and enter The Celestial Nexus..

nodes.title: Route to The Celestial Nexus below:
nodes.description: Route to The Celestial Nexus below:.

nodes.title: Head to I-6 in Ru'Aun Gardens (near Genbu's island); home point #1 is the quickest way there
nodes.description: Head to I-6 in Ru'Aun Gardens (near Genbu's island); home point #1 is the quickest way there. Enter the Shrine of Ru'Avitau Map 2.

nodes.title: Sneak up here.
nodes.description: Sneak up here.

nodes.title: Head south and follow the path to J-7 past the first yellow door
nodes.description: Head south and follow the path to J-7 past the first yellow door. It is highly possible the door will be closed.

location.zone: J-7 past the first yellow door

nodes.title: Then head west past the second yellow door to the control room with 2 Monoliths at H-7.
nodes.description: Then head west past the second yellow door to the control room with 2 Monoliths at H-7..

location.zone: the control room with 2 Monoliths at H-7

nodes.title: Use Silent Oils and head south to a room with 2 Dark Elementals.
nodes.description: Use Silent Oils and head south to a room with 2 Dark Elementals..

nodes.title: You no longer need Sneak from here
nodes.description: You no longer need Sneak from here. But you will need Invisible for the Golems (Aura Statues) all the rest of the way.

nodes.title: Head either east or west and follow the corridor till you come to another room with 2 Dark Elementals at H-10.
nodes.description: Head either east or west and follow the corridor till you come to another room with 2 Dark Elementals at H-10..

location.zone: another room with 2 Dark Elementals at H-10

nodes.title: Head north and then down the stairs to the Celestial Nexus at H-9.
nodes.description: Head north and then down the stairs to the Celestial Nexus at H-9..

nodes.title: Group up with your party if you have not already and enter the battlefield
nodes.description: Group up with your party if you have not already and enter the battlefield. Once you enter, you cannot flee from the battle.

nodes.title: Watch the final cutscene and prepare to battle Eald'narche, who has two forms.
nodes.description: Watch the final cutscene and prepare to battle Eald'narche, who has two forms..

nodes.title: After winning the battle for Through the Quicksand Caves, you are put in a room with a large device.
nodes.description: After winning the battle for Through the Quicksand Caves, you are put in a room with a large device..

location.zone: a room with a large device

nodes.title: Touch all 8 parts of this device to insert your shards from Headstone Pilgrimage.
nodes.description: Touch all 8 parts of this device to insert your shards from Headstone Pilgrimage..

location.zone: insert your shards from Headstone Pilgrimage

nodes.title: After all shards are inserted, you receive a cutscene
nodes.description: After all shards are inserted, you receive a cutscene. If the cutscene does not start, touch a pedestal again.

nodes.title: Follow the path to Tu'Lia.
nodes.description: Follow the path to Tu'Lia..

nodes.title: Since you cannot seem to go any further in the Hall of the Gods, go back to Norg and talk to Gilgamesh (behind the oaken door at K-8)
nodes.description: Since you cannot seem to go any further in the Hall of the Gods, go back to Norg and talk to Gilgamesh (behind the oaken door at K-8).

location.zone: go any further in the Hall of the Gods

nodes.title: Go to Rabao (Home Point #2) and talk to Maryoh Comyujah, who's standing in front of the windmill at G-7
nodes.description: Go to Rabao (Home Point #2) and talk to Maryoh Comyujah, who's standing in front of the windmill at G-7. She will ask you to do something for her.

nodes.title: Travel to D-12 in Western Altepa Desert and head into Quicksand Caves (4).
nodes.description: Travel to D-12 in Western Altepa Desert and head into Quicksand Caves (4)..

location.zone: D-12 in Western Altepa Desert and head into Quicksand Caves

nodes.title: There are a few options to navigate through Quicksand Caves, with your objective to reach I-8 in Quicksand Caves map 7
nodes.description: There are a few options to navigate through Quicksand Caves, with your objective to reach I-8 in Quicksand Caves map 7. To get there, you will pass through map 4.

nodes.title: After defeating the Shadow Lord for nation mission 5-2, enter Norg to receive a cutscene and a Map of Norg.
nodes.description: After defeating the Shadow Lord for nation mission 5-2, enter Norg to receive a cutscene and a Map of Norg..

location.zone: receive a cutscene and a Map of Norg

nodes.title: Note: After completing the Quest Divine Might, if you have not received your rare/ex earring, enter Shrine of Ru'Avitau from H-8/9 in Ru'Aun Gardens.
nodes.description: Note: After completing the Quest Divine Might, if you have not received your rare/ex earring, enter Shrine of Ru'Avitau from H-8/9 in Ru'Aun Gardens..

nodes.title: After completing ZM14 Ark Angels, go to Norg (Home Point #1) and talk to Gilgamesh (L-8).
nodes.description: After completing ZM14 Ark Angels, go to Norg (Home Point #1) and talk to Gilgamesh (L-8)..

nodes.title: Optional: Then go to Lower Jeuno (Home Point #2) and talk to Aldo in Tenshodo HQ J-8 for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Optional: Then go to Lower Jeuno (Home Point #2) and talk to Aldo in Tenshodo HQ J-8 for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Go back to Ru'Aun Gardens.
nodes.description: Go back to Ru'Aun Gardens..

nodes.title: Enter Shrine of Ru'Avitau again for a cutscene.
nodes.description: Enter Shrine of Ru'Avitau again for a cutscene..

nodes.title: Head to Ro'Maeve and zone into the Hall of the Gods at H-5.
nodes.description: Head to Ro'Maeve and zone into the Hall of the Gods at H-5..

location.zone: Ro'Maeve and zone into the Hall of the Gods at H-5

nodes.title: Observe the gate at the other end of Hall of the Gods and your mission log will update.
nodes.description: Observe the gate at the other end of Hall of the Gods and your mission log will update..

nodes.title: Unity Concord Teleportation:If you are signed up to Unity Concord, talking to a Unity Concord NPC and selecting the option Bring me to Wanted...
nodes.description: Unity Concord Teleportation:If you are signed up to Unity Concord, talking to a Unity Concord NPC and selecting the option Bring me to Wanted encounter area will enable you to choose Den of Rancor from the list of Level 128 encounter areas..

nodes.title: Here are the quick ways to the battlefield.
nodes.description: Here are the quick ways to the battlefield..

nodes.title: Otherwise, here is the long way
nodes.description: Otherwise, here is the long way. You will want to start on a Chocobo, because it is a very...

nodes.title: When ready, examine the Shimmering Circle to enter the fight.
nodes.description: When ready, examine the Shimmering Circle to enter the fight..

nodes.title: Click on the "Oaken Door" at (K-8) in Norg for a cutscene with Gilgamesh.
nodes.description: Click on the "Oaken Door" at (K-8) in Norg for a cutscene with Gilgamesh..

location.zone: Norg for a cutscene with Gilgamesh
